explanation: [0-0] On a road, two black electric scooters are parked by the roadside, and across the road is a tall building with a gate in front of it, with a person standing near the gate.

[0-8] Then the camera zooms in, a person carrying a schoolbag and wearing white striped clothes runs towards the gate in the heavy rain, his right hand holding the doorknob. The road is slippery due to the rain, and the person with the schoolbag slips, landing on his bottom, and then falls backwards. The scene then switches to a bamboo forest, where a young man wearing a straw hat pouts his lips and looks forward. As the man moves forward, the scenery behind him moves backwards. Then the camera zooms in, the man turns his head to the right and shows a charming smile. Suddenly, the hat on his head hits the eaves of a bamboo house. The man lowers his head and then looks up.

[8-16] Immediately afterwards, the scene switches to an amusement park, where a man in black is sitting on a round, rotatable amusement ride. As soon as it starts to rotate, the base of the ride becomes unstable, and the man in black falls to the ground along with the ride. Then the scene switches again, a shirtless man is running in a grassy area with uneven ground. The man runs a few steps forward, and there is a large stone on the ground in front of him. As soon as the man steps on the stone, he accidentally slips and rolls forward. Then the man supports the ground with his left arm and puts his right hand on his knee with a painful expression on his face.

[16-21] The scene then switches to a room with a snowman painting on the wall. A man in a gray vest is sitting on a long sofa in the room, with a woman wearing a headscarf sitting on his right. The man has a giant ice cream cone sandwiched between his legs, he is wiping his mouth with a tissue in his right hand, holding a mobile phone in his left hand, and looking at the phone. Then the man puts down his right hand, raises his left hand, and continues to stare at the phone. Then he puts his right hand on the ice cream cone, sticks out his tongue and licks it, then continues to look down at the phone.
